Row.Text: Lowene Empire
Lowee
Lowene
Lowene Empire
Lowee
Lowene
Ultradimension Lowene Empire
U. Lowee
U. Lowene
Lowee
History

Lowee is one of the four primary countries which comprise Gamindustri. Lowee's gelid climate is harsh, but it nonetheless rose to power as a major player on the Gamindustri stage under the guidance of White Heart. Lowee has a very festive look about it, with rainbows, multicolored buildings, and balloons dotting the landscape. It is well known for having a much more diverse populace than the other Gamindustri nations, gleefully accepting immigrants of much older or younger ages than other nations.

All praises and warm greetings to you, benevolent White Heart, whose kindness and fury combined to melt the ice caps and carve a beautiful nation from a desolate, snowy wasteland! Lowee is a land full of magic, where men and women of all ages gather together as equals both for work and play. And it is through your strong leadership that, despite your poor social skills, Lowee became one of the mightiest nations--er, Lady White Heart, did I just insult you? Please forgive me! I won't do it again![NEWLINE][NEWLINE]O stalwart patron of the Land of White Serenity, your beloved nation calls to you once more. You must answer your nation's prayers and lead Lowee to become the greatest nation in Gamindustri once more! Can you fulfill your duty to your people and win the Console War? Can you overcome your lack of physical assets to win over the hearts and minds of people the world over? Can you build a Civilization that can stand the test of time? ...my Lady? Ohhh no. I really, really shouldn't have made that "physical assets" comment...Lady White Heart, please stop looking at me like how a lion looks at a gazelle! Please have merc--[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]*SMASH*[ENDCOLOR]

Please have merc--[NEWLINE][NEWLINE][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]*SMASH*[ENDCOLOR]

Blanc (White Heart)
Blanc (White Heart)
Leader of Lowee
Goddess/CPU of Lowee
Lady of the Ready Body
History

Blanc, better known to the general populace as Lady White Heart, is the CPU of Lowee. Typically quiet and reserved, Blanc has an extremely hot temper when she gets upset, and swears like a sailor. Despite her potential for being hotheaded and mean, she is very devoted to her country. Reading is her favorite hobby.

Enables the [ICON_VV_SHARES] Shares system to transform into White Heart. Gain [ICON_VV_SHARES] Shares per turn from every Tundra and Snow tile worked. Gain [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer points in the Writer's Guild from Population of Cities in We Love the King Day.
Land of White Serenity

Melee and Gunpowder units gain +1 [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength for every 2.5% Shares. Conquering Cities begins We Love the King Day in all Cities. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus vs. Cities when in the territory of a Civilization which whom you're at war and were denounced by.

Melee and Gunpowder units gain +1 [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength for every 2% Shares. Conquering Cities begins We Love the King Day in all Cities. +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat bonus vs. Cities when in the territory of a Civilization which whom you're at war and were denounced by.

Conquering Cities begins We Love the King Day in all your other Cities. Your Leader Magical Girl gains +0.5 [ICON_STRENGTH] Strength/+2 [ICON_PMMM_MOOD] Mood per 1% [ICON_VV_SHARES] Shares, and may use the ability [COLOR_PLAYER_VV_LOWEE_BACKGROUND]Getter Ravine[ENDCOLOR].
White Heart's Wrath
Magical Soldier

Lowee's female soldiers are trained in both the arts of marksmanship and of magic. They are also trained in techniques learned from the novels Blanc has read. Horrifically, they have also been trained in techniques from the novels she has written. This, combined with the fact that Blanc personally assaulted dozens of these soldiers during the first Arfoire incident, has caused recruitment to suffer dramatically.

Unique Rifleman replacement for Lowee. Begins with an extra 2 XP for each [ICON_GREAT_WORK] Great Work of Writing in your Empire. Instantly heals to 100% HP and and gains a +33% [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength bonus for 1 turn whenever you expend a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer.

The Magical Soldier is the Unique Unit for Leanbox, replacing the Rifleman. It begins with 2 additional XP for each Great Work of Writing in your Empire. In addition, whenever you expend a Great Writer, they fully heal and gain +33% Combat Strength for a turn! Therefore, you may wish to hold on to your Great Writers until times of war.
Blanc's Fiction

[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Fully heals[ENDCOLOR] and gains [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+33%[ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for 1 turn[ENDCOLOR] when a Great Writer is expended. Let's just hope this next novel isn't as cringeworthy as what Lady Blanc wrote herself...
Blanc's Fiction (Active)
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+33%[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_STRENGTH] Combat Strength for the remainder of this turn!
White Heart's Wrath
[COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+33%[ENDCOLOR] [ICON_STRENGTH] City Attack bonus.
Mushroom Fiefdom

Lowee's architecture is instantly recognizable by its bright colors and its use of mushroom and pipe motifs. Through the use of magic, Lowee's signature fungal growth can reach enormous sizes even in barren tundra or ice.

+1 [ICON_FOOD] Food. Additional +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food upon discovering Steam Power. Additional +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold after discovering Electronics. +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture after discovering Computers. Each Mushroom Fiefdom worked by your Empire grants +0.25 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer Points in the city with the Writer's Guild. +1 [ICON_PEACE] Faith if worked by Blanc. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_GOLD] Gold if worked by White Heart. +2 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production if worked by Ultradimension White Heart.
Construct a Mushroom Fiefdom
Each Mushroom Fiefdom worked by your Empire grants +0.25 [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer Points in the city with the Writer's Guild.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Must be built on Tundra or Snow.
Lowee City
This Improvement only exists to make mushrooms appear in Lowene Cities. It has no gameplay effect.
Church of White Heart
A religion representing faith in Lady White Heart, which is, consequently, the primary source of her Shares.
Our people are now buying your embarassing novels and inventing new swear words every ten minutes. I worry the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
You gain {1_Num} points towards a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer from your Mushroom Fiefdoms.
You gain {1_Num} points towards a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Writer from Cities celebrating We Love the King Day.
Getter Ravine

[COLOR:31:236:224:255]Cost[ENDCOLOR]: 2 [ICON_MOVES] Movement, 30% [ICON_PMMM_SOUL_GEM] Soul Gem[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]A monstrous swing of White Heart's hammer which splits the very Earth. Deals damage to a single enemy with 1.5x this unit's Combat Strength. Additionally, any Improvement on the tile on which the Defending unit is standing is pillaged. If an Improvement is pillaged this way, it deals an additional 10 Damage to the target.
Insufficient Soul Gem or Movement.
{1_YourUnit} smashed {2_TheirUnit} with Getter Ravine for {3_Damage}!
{1_YourUnit} was smashed by {2_TheirUnit} with Getter Ravine for {3_Damage}!
{1_Name} smashed the Tile Improvement to pieces, which crushed the enemy for an additional {2_Damage} damage!
{1_Name} was crushed by the Tile Improvement wrecked by Getter Ravine for an additional {2_Damage} damage!
Host the Lowee Bash Tournament

One of Lowee's biggest attractions is the Lowee Bash Tournament, a huge free-for-all melee in which up to four simultaneous combatants brawl it out in an attempt to knock each other off of the battle arena. And this year, you think you've got the facilities to increase the number of fighters in the arena to eight! Holding this tournament is sure to bring out the best and the brightest upstarts to recruit into your army. But first, you'll have to make sure you have a wide variety of iconic fighters and equally iconic venues in which these battles can take place.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Lowee [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires {1_Cities} Cities with Colosseums constructed (increases each time the Decision is enacted) [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Requires {2_Units} Units which have reached level 4 or higher [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{3_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]For {4_Turns} turns, gain +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Military Units and new Military Units start with 10 XP. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Certain Events may only occur while this Decision is active.

One of Lowee's biggest attractions is the Lowee Bash Tournament, a huge free-for-all melee in which up to four simultaneous combatants brawl it out in an attempt to knock each other off of the battle arena. And this year, you think you've got the facilities to increase the number of fighters in the arena to eight! Holding this tournament is sure to bring out the best and the brightest upstarts to recruit into your army. But first, you'll have to make sure you have a wide variety of iconic fighters and equally iconic venues in which these battles can take place.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]For {1_Turns} turns, gain +20% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production towards Military Units and new Military Units start with 10 XP. [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Certain Events may only occur while this Decision is active.
Pander to the Casual Audience

It's no secret that your industrial and technical prowess seems to consistently trail behind those of the other CPUs' lands, and even nations led by "mortal" leaders. Rather than continue to beat them at their own game, why not adopt a new strategy? You can turn your weakness into a strength by greatly reducing taxes, and promoting Lowee as a place where all citizens are welcome. This should bring you the allegiance -- and money -- of a "casual" audience which would be put off by the complexity, violence, and sexuality of other nations.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Lowee [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have met all Civilizations in the world [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be below the global average Score amongst all Civilizations in the World [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must be in the Renaissance Era or later [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrate [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you send a Trade Route to a foreign City belonging to a Civilization with a higher Score than you, it grants the originating City +10% Food and Gold. (This effect cannot stack multiple times on the same City.)

It's no secret that your industrial and technical prowess seems to consistently trail behind those of the other CPUs' lands, and even nations led by "mortal" leaders. Rather than continue to beat them at their own game, why not adopt a new strategy? You can turn your weakness into a strength by greatly reducing taxes, and promoting Lowee as a place where all citizens are welcome. This should bring you the allegiance -- and money -- of a "casual" audience which would be put off by the complexity, violence, and sexuality of other nations.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]If you send a Trade Route to a foreign City belonging to a Civilization with a higher Score than you, it grants the originating City +10% Food and Gold. (This effect cannot stack multiple times on the same City.)
Rampant Shovelware

Consistently awful games being produced by sweatshop teams of fewer than a dozen people are becoming rampant. Each movie tie-in and food mascot merchandising vehicle tarnishes the Lowee name more and more. If this keeps up, soon there will be no such thing as a quality Lowee product.[NEWLINE]
Let 'em produce. Money is money.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in all cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]-10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all Cities[ENDCOLOR]
Lowee is rapidly becoming known as the land of shovelware.
Curtail it. Games will now need to be approved and given my Seal of Approval.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+10% [ICON_CULTURE] Culture in all Cities[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]-10% [ICON_GOLD] Gold in all Cities[ENDCOLOR]

The Official Lowee Seal of Quality has been instated, and already the quality of your country's products is improving. Quality games take time, though, so you aren't making quite as much money anymore.
Unauthorized Footage of Lowee

{1_CityState} citizens have brought recording equipment into your lands and have recorded the countryside. This is, of course, an unauthorized use of your intellectual property...and real property. You've got a policy in place to crack down on those who display footage of your country without consent...so, are you going to stand for this?[NEWLINE]
Shut 'em down!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+{1_Culture} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]-30 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CityState}[ENDCOLOR]
You sent a copyright notice to {1_CityState} and demanded they cease and desist. They're not happy, but you've secured your copyright.
Well, whatever. It's not worth bad PR.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+20 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {1_CityState}[ENDCOLOR]
You let {1_CityState} get away with videotaping your property.
I'll allow it only if we can monetize it.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+{1_Gold} [ICON_GOLD] Gold[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]-10 [ICON_INFLUENCE] Influence with {2_CityState}[ENDCOLOR]
You let {1_CityState} get away with videotaping your property, but not without requiring them to pay you royalties.
Temper Tantrum

Something made you mad. You don't even remember what it was that set you off, but you do remember the damage you caused to the infrastructure of your City in your hammer-swinging rage. After seeing that display, a lot of the residents of Lowee have decided to evacuate...[NEWLINE]
I need to learn how to take deep breaths and count to ten...
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital loses 1 Citizen and takes 50 HP damage[ENDCOLOR]
So much for Lowee's family-friendly image, huh?[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]...don't hurt me!
Tripped
While in a Lowee Bash Tournament exhibition match, you tripped and fell over your own feet.[NEWLINE]
Oww! What dumbfuck puts a mechanic like that in a video game?!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]{1_Turns} turn(s) of [ICON_RESISTANCE] Resistance in your [ICON_CAPITAL] Capital
Hopefully they remove that silly mechanic in the next game...
Lowee Bash Guest Fighter!

People the world over have been clamoring for you to allow foreigners into the Lowee Bash, which has historically only been open to native Lowenes. You've decided that now is a perfect time to allow a foreign guest fighter into the Bash! More specifically, you're going to allow one of your most trusted, allied world leaders to join the fray! The question is, who?[NEWLINE]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]For {1_Turns} Turns, Diplomatic Relations increase greatly between your Empires and both Empires receive +4 [ICON_TOURISM] Tourism in every City[ENDCOLOR]
{1_LeaderName}'s joining of the Bash has lit the world on fire! There's no stopping this hype train!

{1_LeaderName} has made you an honorary guest fighter in the Lowee Bash Tournament! You have been granted a [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]diplomatic boost[ENDCOLOR] with them, as well as [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]+4 Tourism in all Cities for {2_Turns} turns[ENDCOLOR]!
Power of a Star!

During your personal participation in the Lowee Bash Tournament, you found one of the rare Super Stars, much like the ones used by the Legendary Plumber himself! It is an ephemeral item, but for a small while, Lowee will be absolutely unstoppable in combat![NEWLINE]
Bring. It. On![ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All Units immediately heal fully, and for the next 3 turns, they fully heal each turn[ENDCOLOR]
The Star's Power has made your army nearly immortal! Well, temporarily, anyway.
Superspace Ambassador

The combatants participating in the Lowee Bash Tournament have successfully thwarted a major, extraterrestrial threat to Lowee, with the help of two guests from foreign lands. This calls for a massive celebration![NEWLINE]
We may fight amongst ourselves, but overall, we are still united!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]An exceptionally long [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins[ENDCOLOR]
Lowee's prosperity is all but assured, thanks to the heroes of your Empire.
Goddess Blog

Your ever-increasing Shares are a testament to your growing popularity, and now the populace wants to see more of you. You had the idea of starting up a "Goddess Blog," to help spread the word of the beauty and power of Lowee. But what will you write about first?[NEWLINE]

Your ever-increasing Shares are a testament to your growing popularity, and now the populace wants to see more of you. Your previous Goddess Blogs were a success, so you feel it is time to write another. Now, what to write about this time?[NEWLINE]
Make a clickbait list of the top 5 Lowene novelists.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Immediate boost of {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizen in your Empire[ENDCOLOR]
Speak about how to keep warm in Lowee's frigid climate.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Immediate boost of {1_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every Tundra and Snow tile in your Empire[ENDCOLOR]
Discuss magic and how it makes life easier for Lowee's populace.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Receive a free Great Person of your Choice[ENDCOLOR]
Tell a story about the exploits of the Legendary Plumber.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All existing Units gain +10 XP[ENDCOLOR]
"Other M is no longer canon."
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age begins[ENDCOLOR]
You have written an entry in your Goddess Blog. It was a hit with the people!
